name: Figa
description:
Incarnate and reincarnate as a cat in this game of skills.

ActionMove left
←←Move right
→→JumpSpace bar
ARestartBackspace
YMenu
HomeBack / Start

You'll start your adventure in the Endless World, an infinite stream of levels that adapt to your performance, and once you reach a certain skill level you'll get your entry in the Ankh Trail which contains a series of increasingly harder hand-crafted levels.

The game feature an online rankings system.

Initial Alpha release v0.2.0.

Join the discussion on Discord!
